title: Living Studio Website
description: This site - a personal studio that evolves over time, inspired by Bauhaus design principles.
intention: Create a space that feels like a curated collection rather than a static portfolio.
whatIDid: Designed Bauhaus-inspired grid system and typography
Built interactive Collection feature with modal gallery
Created Now section for living updates
whatSurprisedMe: How satisfying it is to build something personal with modern tools.
nextIteration: Adding more collection items and experimenting with subtle animations.
